overview:
Marc brings over 20 years of experience in enterprise product development, technical leadership, and business operations. Marc comes to iControl from Supply Chain Alliance (SCA), Inc., a provider of supply chain management solutions for global technology companies, where he acted as chief technology officer and director of technical services. Prior to SCA, Marc served as the vice president of engineering and operations at Semagix, Inc., an enterprise software solutions provider. Before joining Semagix, Marc served as vice president of product development and customer service for Audiohighway, Inc., where he helped pioneer the emerging online media distribution market.

Earlier in his career, Marc held senior management and executive positions with Voquette, 3COM/U.S. Robotics, and Zenith Electronics. Marc holds six US patents.

Source :iControl.com
